channel.title: Corruption on Ziggurat
channel.description: Recent content in Corruption on Ziggurat

item.title: Official Magnetic Scrolls Solution Books
item.description: While digging through some boxes of old Stuff from the attic I came across a couple of solution books for the adventure games “Corruption” and “Fish!” by Magnetic Scrolls. I got these directly from Magnetic Scrolls, and they’re far superior to regular old walkthroughs as they include location maps, hints for specific situations along with the step by step solutions.
